description.value:
Trigger A creature damages a spirit collector

Effect The damaged spirit collector releases a wave of force to repel the triggering creature, dealing [[/r (4d10+20)[force]]] damage to the triggering creature, who must attempt a Reflex save. The trap then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is pushed back 5 feet.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is pushed back 10 feet, and lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is pushed back 20 feet, and lands prone.

details.description: Four spirit collectors drain the souls from nearby creatures.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:47] (legendary) to sever the connection between Urgathoa and each spirit collector, @Check[type:thievery|dc:50] (legendary) to deactivate each spirit collector, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 50) to counteract each spirit collector
details.routine: (4 actions) This trap loses 1 action each turn for each disabled spirit collector. Each spirit collector uses 1 action to drain the souls of all creatures within 30 feet, dealing [[/r (4d10+20)[force]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:46|basic:true]). On a failed save, a creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} or increases their drained and stupefied conditions by 1 (by 2 on a critical failure).
